notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected shelters and other buildings at the Gendrasa refugee camp in Maban County, Upper Nile State, South Sudan. As of 08 April 2015 a total of 9,692 shelters were detected as well as 225 infrastructure and support buildings. The number of shelters increased by approximately 17% since the previous UNOSAT analysis which used imagery from 06 December 2013 and located a total of 8,028 shelters. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field; structure locations are subject to a spatial error margin of +/- three meters. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR-UNOSAT.
